source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_SEQ_00<tab>Tonaxia would repay a debt of kindness.
target: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_SEQ_00<tab>シルフの仮宿のトナクシアは、冒険者に依頼があるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_SEQ_01<tab>The sylphs of Little Solace are fond of Rolfe Hawthorne, who has been a friend to their people. Tonaxia would repay the man's kindness with an offering of wild vegetables from this year's bountiful harvest. Take them and decorate the Hawthorne Hut as directed by Tonaxia.
target: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_SEQ_01<tab>トナクシアの依頼を受けた。ホウソーン家の山塞の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E90D301 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DD01 /var>」を置こう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_SEQ_02<tab>You have decked the hut with wild vegetables as Tonaxia requested. Speak with Rolfe Hawthorne, who is sure to be overjoyed at the surprise gift.
target: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E90D301 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DD01 /var>を置いた。ホウソーン家の山塞の「ロルフ・ホウソーン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_SEQ_03<tab>Despite being less than pleased with the gift and the means of delivery, Rolfe nevertheless appreciates the kindness of his forest friends. Inform Tonaxia that the deed is done.
target: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_SEQ_03<tab>ロルフ・ホウソーンと話した。シルフの仮宿の「トナクシア」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_SEQ_04<tab>Tonaxia is delighted to hear of Rolfe's joy and frustration both. It would seem the troublesome nature of the “gift” was exactly as the mischievous sylph intended.
target: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_SEQ_04<tab>トナクシアに報告した。ロルフにとって、トナクシアの用意した野菜は、あまり嬉しいものではなかったようだが、厚意には感謝しているようだ。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TODO_00<tab>Place the wild vegetables around the Hawthorne Hut.
target: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TODO_00<tab>ホウソーン家の山塞の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E90D301 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DD01 /var>を置く
TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TODO_01<tab>ロルフ・ホウソーンと話す

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_000<tab>Walking one at hut-house is always kind to these ones! This one would repay walking one's kindness.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_000山塞に住んでいるロルフ・ホウソーンには、
いつも世話になってるでふっち。
だからお礼をちたいのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_001<tab>These ones harvested many eat-plants, but these ones do not eat! This one would not be wasteful one.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_001今年は、仮宿で採れる「お野菜」が豊作なんでふっち。
あまりに豊作すぎて、捨てるほどあるのでふっち。
だから、ロルフにおしつけ……じゃない、おすそ分けでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_002<tab>This one would decorate hut-house with eat-plants, make hut-house pretty place! But this one is busy one. Would kind one go in this one's place?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_002「ホウソーン家の山塞」のまわりに、
この「」を置いてくるでふっち。
野菜で飾りつけて、ステキな山塞にしてあげるでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_ROLFE_000_020<tab>Blast! Well, I'll be, they've done it again! ...Hm?
target: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_ROLFE_000_020<tab>……ん？　仮宿のシルフたちから届け物だって？

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_ROLFE_000_021<tab>What's that? It was <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who “decorated” my home with overgrown weeds at the sylphs' request? <sigh> Oh dear...
target:
TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_ROLFE_000_021これは…………！？
あいつらめ、また例によって山塞のあちこちに放置……
じゃない、飾りつけをしやがったんだろう？

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_ROLFE_000_022<tab>Look, I appreciate the sentiment, but I'd appreciate it a fair sight more if the next gift from our forest friends was delivered straight to my doorstep...and didn't taste of dirt, at that.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_ROLFE_000_022まったく、片付けるこっちの身にもなってほしいぜ……。
それに……この野菜、マズくて食えたモンじゃないんだ。
でもまぁ、気持ちは嬉しいぜ。ありがとよ。はは……。

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_010<tab>Decorate hut-house with eat-plants, let walking one know it is gift from these ones. Kind one will do this for this one, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_010「ホウソーン家の山塞」のまわりに
「」を置いてくるでふっち。
終わったら、ロルフにあいさつするでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_030<tab>Friendly one returns! Walking one was pleased, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_030おかえりでふっち！
……ロルフは喜んでくれたふっち？

source: TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_031<tab>Walking one wants next gift delivered to doorstep? But what would be the fun in that? Tee hee!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL101_01257_TONAXIA_000_031そりゃよかったでふっち！
野菜は捨てるほどあるのでふっち。
よ～し、じゃんじゃん贈るでふっち！
